customAmountOptions.message: provides shelter, meals and care for {{n}} people
customAmountOptions.messageSingular: provides shelter, meals and care for 1 person

customContent:
Help hungry people with a holiday meal!

So many men, women, and children in our community are hungry, homeless and hurting. It doesn't take much to ease their struggling. For just $2.09, you can provide a complete Thanksgiving meal, served with kindness and love.

A meal is the first step towards a new life. Thank you for giving hope to so many men, women, and children in our community!
